thread.title: Andretti Karting Opens this Weekend in Marietta
thread.title_full: Andretti Karting Opens this Weekend in Marietta | Examiner.com

author: Maria Smith
title: Andretti Karting Opens this Weekend in Marietta
text:
Andretti Indoor Karting & Games opens this weekend Maria Smith Ladies and gentleman...are you ready? The newest entertainment complex, Andretti Indoor Karting & Games has zoomed into Cobb County...again. Following the success of the Roswell Andretti Indoor Karting & Games, which has entertained kids and adults alike since 2001, the newest location in Marietta hopes to extend the fun to more area families.
Andretti Karting is named after the famous Andretti racing family, and like the family, they try to only produce winners. The Marietta location offers state of the art gaming, electric go-karts on several Andretti-designed multi-level tracks, bowling, a ropes course, driving simulators, laser tag, a state-of-the-art XD Dark Ride theater, and driving simulators as well as a full-service restaurant and several bars.
The newest Andretti Indoor Karting & Games in Marietta offers 100,000 square feet of space. It has activities and games for the whole family, as well as offering a cool vibe adults without kids will definitely enjoy.
GRAND OPENING THIS WEEKEND INCLUDES RAFFLES, GIVEAWAYS
Andretti Indoor Karting & Games will open its doors to the public this Saturday, October 17, 2015. They will have.fun raffles and giveaways for some great Andretti swag including: Family Fun Packages, a free kids birthday party, Atlanta Movie Tour tickets and even a weekend stay from Marriott Courtyard! Also, from 12noon – 2:00 p.m., Atlanta Movie Tours will be on site offering zombie makeovers for guests who experience the XD Dark Ride zombie movie and from 3:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. Star 94 will be on site with music, giveaways and more!
